name: SomeRandomPCCleaningSoftware
description:
Game description is in the Screenshot!

I created this game while participating in ludum dare 42.

This is the first time I participated in a game jam.
Because of that, time got a real problem and I had to cut many features.
Even sound did not make it into the game.
Anyway, I hope you have fun with it...(there may be still bugs here and there)

  • Tools used: Blender for the character
  • Godot as game engine
  • Krita, Piskel and Gimp as drawing programs

Bug-fix update 14.08.18 - 17:52:

  • Some level fixes to make some parts playable
  • Fixed the RESTART button
  • Fixed some buggy collision meshes

The updated Version is the version with “FIXED-1.1-“. But the original version is still available!
